name: Argentina
startIntroPart1: Good day it is, Julio, you, unlike others, did great things for Argentina, a prideful nation with good prowess. Argentina came from the provinces of the De La Plata river, who broke free from Spain into their own path. Conquering the Mapuches, they expanded their territory, and after that, their economy grew more and more, until becoming one of the best in Latin America. Altough not being very successful in war, Argentina today is stable and periodically good.
startIntroPart2: President, your people call you to bring good to the country. Will you make a civilization that can stand the pass of time?
declaringWar: I need to do this, for the sake of progress. You were never my friend.
attacked: Ha! You think you can defeat me? Don't you know we are better than you?
defeated: You are just another nation, this victory will not change that, because I actually gaved up.
introduction: I am julio Roca, leader of Argentina. We'll treat you with honor and respect, if you do the same.
hateHello: Will you treat me how I deserve?!
tradeRequest: I know you want this trade, I'm sure of that.

name: Bolivia
startIntroPart1: Finally, you are here, welcome! You now lead the diverse nation of Bolivia. On the peaks of the Andes, Bolivia sits, with amazing landscapes, and dozens of cultures within the nation. The history of Bolivia is... not quite good, but Bolivia is a cultural center and has lot of potential
startIntroPart2: So, will you exploit the potential of the nation, and bring her greatness? Your people long haven been waiting for that. Will you give them what they deserve? - sea, might and pride? - Will you build a civilization which can stand the pass of time?
declaringWar: After hard thought, Bolivia has no other choice. War is upon us.
attacked: Come here, is this what you want? Well then... then you looked for it.
defeated: Couldn't you leave alone? Couln't you!?
introduction: Hello there, you can call me Belzu. Now, tell about your people please.
hateHello: Will you give me what I deserve?!
tradeRequest: I'm sure your and my people will love this trade!
uniques: Provides 1 happiness per 2 additional social policies adopted

name: Brazil
startIntroPart1: Hail to the great emperor of Brazil, the great nation born from portugesse and natives. The grand nation of Brazil was built upon the portugese use of slaves, but at difference with others, they integrated them into their culture, the portugese language. Together, mestizos and natives, got them selves independence from Portugal and formed the Empire of Brazil. With cunning diplomacy, fierce force, and resource abundance, Brazil managed to become one of the best in Latin America, with all his resources and culture, certainly they are powerful.
startIntroPart2: Come back, dear emperor, your people call you to crush their enemies, and outshine their rivals. Do you accept the challenge? Will you make of Brazil the best in the world? Can you make a civilization that can stand the pass of time?
declaringWar: The empire of Brazil shall destroy your ill nation.
attacked: The only thing I worry for, is for the people affected by this.
defeated: This is unfortunate, after all, you are the victor.
introduction: I am Pedro the II, emperor of Brazil. Peace and prosperity for our nations.
tradeRequest: I'm happy to anounce this trade offer.
uniques: [+2 Culture] from every [Lumber mill] once [Acoustics] is discovered

name: Colombia
startIntroPart1: Be welcomed, president. You lead the beatiful and joyful nation of Colombia, a country with great cultural and bio diversity. ...One, two, three! Three had been the attempts to break free - getting terribly punished - but with determination, Colombia managed independence with the help of Simon Bolivar, to later join his abitious proyect of the Gran Colombia. Since the start we had a ton of great political division, which brought many problems and conflicts, but despite all the troubles, Colombia ought to help other, no matter what. The conflicts didn't cease until early 21st century, where the sun finally rises over Colombia to achieve greatness.
startIntroPart2: President Santander, your people want you to lead them to greatness. They want you to convert them in to the best nation. Will you answer the call? Can you fight and triump over the adversities? Can you build a civilization that can stand the pass of time?
declaringWar: Prepare to lose your empire of opression!
attacked: You will see how fruitless this will be for you. Wait and see.
defeated: I hope you treat my people good, don´t take away their happiness.
introduction: Greetings! This is Colombia, my wordeful land. Want a coffee?
tradeRequest: I  thought you might be intested in this...

name: Chile
startIntroPart1: Hello there, general O'Higgins, great hero of the independence of Chile, one of the longest and more prosperous countries in latin america. Your role in the independence campaing was undeniably crucial. Chile has stand firm and secure behind the Andes, and in between the deserts of Atacama and Patagonia. The abundance of minerals makes Chile very wealthy, but more than resources, their leader ship has been of good will. Chile has demonstrated to his rivals of what he is capable of, so...
startIntroPart2: ...Mighty hero, will you take the lead and propel Chile to his best? Can you defeat your enemies with swiftness and power? Can you build a civilization that can stand the pass of time?
declaringWar: If it´s necesary to cross the mountains to destroy you, my army is willing to do it.
attacked: From the desert to the Patagonia, we will defend our homeland whatever it costs
defeated: We haven´t managed to defend our homeland. This lands are now yours. Goodbye.
introduction: Welcome to our lands. I hope that our nations grow strong and in peace.
hateHello: Could you have at least have some respect to my nation?!
tradeRequest: Let´s negotiate, we have resources that interest both of us
uniqueText: +2 Gold and +2 Production for every Quarry

name: Mexico
startIntroPart1: Ay! Greetings mr. president. You lead the famous and cultured nation of Mexico. On the ruins of Tenoctitlan, the Aztec capital, and on top of the lake, Mexico city stands on what was one of the empires crushed by the spanish. A heroic independence did not give stability to the wonderful nation, as it's political conflict lead to many unfortunate events, but when it was need Mexico unites agaist foreing agressors and do the best they can. Even with internal struggles, and bad geography, Mexico is one of the most influencial cultures of America.
startIntroPart2: Oh great lider of the Mexican republic, your people desperadly call you, they call you to bring them once again peace, and glory as well. Will you help your people? Will you transform this nation into the best? Will you create a civilization that stands the test of time?
declaringWar: First comes the homeland, therefore you must not be in my way.
attacked: Mexicans! Prepare to defend our homeland!
defeated: Nooo, why? Everything I did was for our motherland.
introduction: Good morning, I'm Benito Juarez. Come with me and see my nation.
tradeRequest: Could you accept this trade offer?

name: Paraguay
startIntroPart1: Good day you may have. You now lead the firm nation of Paraguay. Paraguay faced many rivals wanting him dead, but they survived, - leading many to think they dont actually exist - no mather how big it was, they survived. From, winning to Spanish Empire, to battling agaist a triple alliance of might, to defeating Bolivia in the Chaco War, little Paraguay has proven capable of facing anything and anyone, and having success in the process.
startIntroPart2: Good President, will you protect your people agaist all odds? Can you make a civilization that can Resist the pass of time?!
declaringWar: I hate your idea of justice. When justice needs to be done, I am more than willing to do it.
attacked: If war is what you want, war you will have.
defeated: We did our best, we resisted untill the end, however... you won.
introduction: Greetings. I am Gaspar Rodrigez, avenger of the rightful and defender of my people. Who are you?
tradeRequest: You want this, I want that. Deal?
uniques: +[10]% Production when constructing [{Military} {Land}] units [in all cities]

name: Peru
startIntroPart1: Mr. President, welcome. Has you know, you lead the great, ancient, cultural nation of the Peru. The nations dates back to the mighty Incas, after being colonised. The colony was one of the major ones for the spanish - and that wasn't for no reason -. The ungrateful spaniards wasted all the money, increased taxes, and combined with many other things, Peru rebeled. After a failed attempt, the joint effort of Simon Bolivar, and most importantly, San Martin, gave the freedom to the peruvians, which continued to exploit their mineral richies, and culture abundance.
startIntroPart2: Great governor, your people want to further expand their culture and get more prestige. Will you accept the offer? Can you make a civilization that can stand the pass of time?
declaringWar: Great lands ruled by a bad lider, your people don't deserve you, I will take care of them better than you.
attacked: I will give you one of the best wars on history! And the worst defeat in yours.
defeated: History repeats it self. Therefore, Peru shall rise again.
introduction: Greetings. I am Martin Vizcarra, president of Perú. I hope you can become a valuable ally.
tradeRequest: Look at all these goods! We should trade, don't we?

name: Venezuela
startIntroPart1: Coronel Marcos Perez Jimenez, you have been a great disciplined, one who built this country. Its richness and beauty wonder many countries. The beautiful country born with the first settlers, warriors and fisher men. But our republican history starts when, Francisco de Miranda, a great exelent general, and Simon Bolivar, a venezuelan strategist and fearless warrior, taking advantage of the weakened position of Spain would proclaim Venezuelan independence. The so dreamed independece would not come until the Battle of Carabobo, glory to the brave people, Venezuela has been born in Carabobo!, and the venezuelan richness would have a rise mid the 20 century, thanks to their resources.
startIntroPart2: Coronel! Your people call you, and express their affect, it's time to achieve what we have been waiting for years, it's time to bring back the glory that Venezuela deserves! Do you accept the challenge, your highnes? Can you build a civilization that can stand the pass of time?
declaringWar: Your nation is a danger for our sovereignty.
attacked: Expect a ferocious battle, which you won´t win.
defeated: I have failed you Venezuela!... I have failed you.
introduction: A pleasure to meet you, I am Marco Pérez, president of Venezuela. I hope we get along.
tradeRequest: I hope you accept this; ¡it´s practically a gift!
uniques: Receive free [Great General] when you discover [Military Science]

name: Uruguay
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this will not be fruitful for you.
defeated: We were too weak to protect ourselves, how could we imagine otherwise
